page.title: 20General items,Abermorddu
page.content: {Education:}Parents are concerned about the general worsening of provision in the county in recent times. This view is shared by teachers in the local primary school. Pupils in the school who have contributed to the Domesday project are Alasdair Forman, James Felton, Justin Clements,Edward Sansbury, Claire Jones, Sarah Turner, Kerry Lockett, Rebekah Tilston, Lisa Blackwell, Paul Hewitt,Bridget Garrod and Robert Williams. The project was co-ordinated by and the items edited by Mr. Ian Swain, the headteacher at Abermorddu school.
